Question
========

11% of first-year students take an additional course in Statistics. Suppose you take a random sample of 12 first-year students. What is the probability that all 12 students will take the Statistics course?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,1112
* 0,11
* 0,8912
* 0,89

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.1112: Correct
* 0.11: Incorrect
* 0.8912: Incorrect
* 0.89: Incorrect
